version 3.0.0 

  1. 
var xml = XmlBuilder.Create();
                
xml.Declaration();
                
xml.Comment("Someone comment");
                            
xml.Users(XmlBuilder.Section(users => {
    users.Comment("Users");
    users.User(new { Id = 1 }, XmlBuilder.Section(user => {
        user.FirstName("Kiro");
        user.LastName("Zlatnia");
        user.UserName("zlatnia");
        user.Age(50);
        user.Email("kiro@zlatnia.bg");
        user.Phone("089855533");
    }));
}));
            
  2.                 
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?>
<!--Someone comment-->
<Users>
    <!--Users-->
    <User Id="1">
        <FirstName>Kiro</FirstName>
        <LastName>Zlatnia</LastName>
        <UserName>zlatnia</UserName>
        <Age>50</Age>
        <Email>kiro@zlatnia.bg</Email>
        <Phone>089855533</Phone>
    </User>
</Users>
